title: Ranked Division skipping/jumping
body:
Yo all
rito can you please tell me why i am on a 14 ranked win streak and havent skipped a divison yet.
i know if you get around 8-9 wins in a row you can skip a division.

Can you please tell me why i didnt get it{{champion:103}}

replies.body: Your mmr was too low to begin with. Right now you are playing where you ought to be. Once your mmr far exceeds your placement then you will beginning skipping majestically towards higher divisions ♥

I only duo'ed for like 3 games.
i was already on a 10 win streak before the duo

but anyways i know why i didnt now
and it not because of duo
